title: Reception lobby bar and café, Skybox lounge, Public art plaza
posting_body: Welcome to Chorus
Chorus is prominently and conveniently located at the cross point of SF's most dynamic neighborhoods.
The private residences are complete with the latest technology and top-of-the-line appliances.
Outside the home, Chorus residents enjoy access to a unique collection of amenities including a rooftop pool, outdoor American Ninja Warrior course, solarium, speakeasy and lobby cocktail bar.
The community is expertly maintained 24 hours a day by a dedicated team with attention to every detail.
Join the Chorus family today!
Amenities Include:
Valet parking
Rooftop solarium with floating fireplace, private dining kitchen and skyline views
Backyard terrace with pizza oven
Reception lobby bar and café
Public art plaza
Attended arrival desk
Speakeasy gaming lounge with skee ball, foosball and arcade favorites
Co-working space with private conference rooms
Dog run, grooming station and pet wash
Saltwater pool with private cabanas, lounge areas and Jacuzzi
Adjacent Chorus Hall 227-seat performing arts venue
Ninja Warrior course with an 8-foot warped wall and octagon frame
